pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Quantitative Ethnobotany Indices // Calculate common quantitative ethnobotany indices to assess the cultural significance of plant species based on informant consensus. The package closely follows the paper by Tardio and Pardo-de- Santayana (2008). Tardio, J., and M. Pardo-de-Santayana, 2008. Cultural Importance Indices: A Comparative Analysis Based on the Useful Wild Plants of Southern Cantabria (Northern Spain) 1. Economic Botany, 62(1), 24-39. DOI:10.1007/s12231-007-9004-5.
